extends Object
    ControllerInit Class.

    Daniele

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void backToMenu(Object button)
      Returns the Controller to the menu state following the pressed object.
      void buttonPressed(Object button)
      Defines which function to call depending on the button pressed and the state of the Controller.
      void cardInsertion(Object button)
      Check for proper card insertion and set up pin entry screen.
      void cardRemoval(Object button)
      Check for proper card removal and reset View and Controller.
      String deleteOneDigit(String string)
      Delete the last char from a string.
      StatusATM getStatus()
      Returns the current state of the Controller.
      void menuInitSelection(Object button)
      Management of initial menu selection.Once the menu option is selected it updates the status of the Controller and calls the proper method to show the correct view.
      void operationEnd()
      Defines the View in termination operation phase.
      void pinCounterReset()
      Resets the number of pin insertion attempts to zero.
      void pinInsertion(Object button)
      Management of pin insertion.Once the pin is validated it updates the status of the Controller.
      void pinReset()
      Resets the entered pin to an empty string.
      void resetControllerInit()
      Resets the Controller, making it ready for the first user interaction.
      void resetViewInit()
      Resets the View to the main screen: welcome message, card insertion possibility and money withdrawal deactivated.
      void resetViewInitMenu()
      Resets the View to the menu screen: initial menu message, card insertion possibility off and money withdrawal deactivated.
      void setStatus(StatusATM status)
      Sets the current state of the controller.
